service.description: The service for which this this search string was written

search-string.description: Search string you wish to run against the selected service

enabled.description: Determines if search is enabled 1 = enabled 0 = disabled

last-run.description: Keeps track of the last time the search for this seed was executed.

update-freq.description: Keeps track of how frequently this search should be re-run (in hours).

found-host.description: Host that was discovered using this search.

description: Object holds the raw searches that populate the rest of the event. This should be the first thing you make for a misphunter event.
name: misphunter-seed
